alert.note: Alert for Hamblen; Jefferson; Northwest Cocke; Northwest Greene (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson, northwestern Cocke, west central Greene and Hamblen Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 400 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over White Pine, or near Morristown, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morristown, White Pine, Baneberry, Russellville, Alpha, Lowland and Mohawk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Hamblen; Jefferson; Northwest Cocke; Northwest Greene
